MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the EH32 and EH33 postcode area of Longniddry and Tranent. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are currently carrying out testing to narrow down the faulty section of the network. and we now expect your supply to be restored by 8am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:56am on 22nd October
